mapper.select: SELECT ch.ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME, CHAT_TIME, CHAT_ID, CHAT_TYPE ,EMP_ID,CHAT_CON FROM CHAT_ROOM cr, JSON_TABLE(ROOM_MEM, '$.ROOM[*]' COLUMNS ( IDS VARCHAR(20) PATH '$.id' ) ) AS jt, (SELECT ROOM_ID, EMP_ID ,CHAT_ID , CHAT_TIME , CHAT_TYPE, CHAT_CON, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(PARTITION BY ROOM_ID ORDER BY CHAT_TIME DESC) AS mx FROM CHAT ) ch WHERE IDS = #{emp_id} AND cr.ROOM_ID = ch.ROOM_ID AND mx = 1 ORDER BY CHAT_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_CHAT.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT (CHAT_ID,ROOM_ID,EMP_ID,CHAT_CON,CHAT_TIME,CHAT_TYPE) VALUES (#{seq},#{room_id},#{emp_id},TO_CLOB(#{chat_con}),SYSDATE,#{chat_type})

SELECT SEQ_CHAT_FILE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT_FILE (FILE_CHAT_ID,FILE_CHAT_UUID,FILE_CHAT_ORIGINNM, FILE_CHAT_TYPE,FILE_UPLOADPATH,CHAT_ID) VALUES (#{seq},#{file_chat_uuid},#{file_chat_originnm}, #{file_chat_type},#{file_uploadpath}, (SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(CHAT_ID)) FROM CHAT))

SELECT SEQ_CHAT_ROOM.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CHAT_ROOM (ROOM_ID, ROOM_NAME,ROOM_MEM) VALUES(#{seq},#{room_name},#{room_mem})
